layout.title: Layout: Property listing layout
layout.message: This layout will list Real Estate properties in your OS Property system with many different parameters like Category, Property types, Country, State ..etc

field.name: type_id
field.label: Select Property type
field.description: Choose the property type which you want to display properties

field.name: catIds
field.label: Select category
field.description: Choose the category which you want to display properties

field.name: country_id
field.label: Select Country
field.description: Choose the country which you want to display properties

field.name: company_id
field.label: Select Company
field.description: Choose the company which you want to display properties

field.name: min_price
field.label: Min Price
field.description: Enter min price which you want to display properties with higher price

field.name: max_price
field.label: Max Price
field.description: Enter max price which you want to display properties with lower price

field.name: theme_id
field.label: Select Theme
field.description: Choose the theme which you want to display properties. If you leave this field empty, OS Property will use the Published theme.

field.name: isFeatured
field.label: Show featured properties
field.description: Do you want to show only featured properties

field.name: isSold
field.label: Select Market status
field.description: Please select Market status of properties you want to show

field.name: orderby
field.label: Sort properties by
field.description: Please select sort properties by

field.name: ordertype
field.label: Order properties by
field.description: Please select order properties by

field.name: state_id
field.label: State ID
field.description: Please enter state id

field.name: city_id
field.label: City ID
field.description: Please enter city id

field.name: max_properties
field.label: Max properties
field.description: Please enter maximum number of properties that will be shown. Leave it empty if you want to show all properties

field.name: show_filterform
field.label: Show filter form
field.description: Do you want to show filter form at the top

field.name: show_categoryfilter
field.label: Show Category dropdown filter
field.description: Do you want to show Category dropdown filter at Filter Form

field.name: show_propertytypefilter
field.label: Show Type dropdown filter
field.description: Do you want to show Property type dropdown filter at Filter Form

field.name: show_marketstatusfilter
field.label: Show Market status filter
field.description: Do you want to show Market status filter at Filter Form

field.name: show_locationfilter
field.label: Show Location filter
field.description: Do you want to show Location filter dropdown lists (country, state and city) at Filter Form

field.name: show_keywordfilter
field.label: Show Keyword filter
field.description: Do you want to show Keyword inputbox at Filter Form

field.name: show_pricefilter
field.label: Show Price filter
field.description: Do you want to show Price filter at Filter Form

field.name: show_agenttypefilter
field.label: Show Agent/Owner Type filter
field.description: Do you want to show Agent/Owner filter at Filter Form

field.name: agenttype
field.label: Properties posted by
field.description: Do you want to select specific user type (Agent/Owner) that properties were posted by
